item.description: author = “ppm1111” title = “Nightwatch.js 基礎斷言語法” date = “2020-11-23” description = “Nightwatch.js 基礎斷言語法” tags = [ “javascript”, “testing”, “nightwatch”, “themes”, ] categories = [ “nightwatch”, ] series = [“nightwatch”] +++ Nightwatch.js 基礎斷言語法 nightwatch 為 javascript 的 e2e testing 套件，使用W3C WebDriver api操作瀏覽器，可以模擬使用者操作瀏覽器的行為，確保 ui 流程都正確。 範例程式碼 <template> <div class="home"> <a class="google-class" href="https://www.google.com/" id="google" >Google link</a> <input id="google-input" value="test"> </div> </template> <script> export default { name: 'Home', mounted: function() { document.cookie = "username=John Doe"; } } </script> <style> #google { color:#ff0000; } </style> 畫面 測試程式碼 nightwatch斷言 module.
